Key:
The meaning of love is so complex,
don't you think?

Jeez, Shido. You'd better do a good job or else
we'll never get out of this world...

I know, but... Kotori, how would you answer? What
the meaning of love is.

Well... It'll be difficult to give the kind of
answer that Arusu wants. I mean, it's hard to
define to begin with.

I know, right... If you think about it, neither of
us has really dated before. So it's hard to
feel... Oh.
What's the matter? Did you think of something?
I wonder if a married person would know.

There's no way there's a married person here.
Jeez, you almost had me thinking you were onto
something.

What about parents? I wonder what they'd answer if
you asked them... What is love?
I don't know. I mean, ours are barely home.

Anyways, good luck to both of us. In the end,
this is the only way we know to get out.
(*Sigh*... This is going to be tough.)
